languages.text: "Его преступления были тяжки, но не стали препятствием на получении им милости. Еретик был очищен на священной операции и обращен к новой миссии — служить Империуму в качестве сервитора. Как и многие, многие другие".

"His crimes were grievous, but they were no barrier to his receiving mercy. The heretic was purified in a holy procedure and converted to a new mission to serve the Imperium as a servitor. As were many, many others."
languages.original_text: "Его преступления были тяжки, но не стали препятствием на получении им милости. Еретик был очищен на священной операции и обращен к новой миссии — служить Империуму в качестве сервитора. Как и многие, многие другие".

traits.locale_text: "His crimes were grievous, but they were no barrier to his receiving mercy. The heretic was purified in a holy procedure and converted to a new mission to serve the Imperium as a servitor. As were many, many others."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "His crimes were grievous, but they were no barrier to his receiving mercy. The heretic was purified in a holy procedure and converted to a new mission to serve the Imperium as a servitor. As were many, many others."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “他犯下了严重的罪行，但即便如此，他也应当得到怜悯。那个异端分子经过了神圣的改造，得到了净化。他和很多其他罪犯一样，被改造成了机仆，获得了新的使命，忠诚地为帝国服务。”
languages.original_text: "His crimes were grievous, but they were no barrier to his receiving mercy. The heretic was purified in a holy procedure and converted to a new mission to serve the Imperium as a servitor. As were many, many others."

traits.locale_text: “他犯下了严重的罪行，但即便如此，他也应当得到怜悯。那个异端分子经过了神圣的改造，得到了净化。他和很多其他罪犯一样，被改造成了机仆，获得了新的使命，忠诚地为帝国服务。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Seine Verbrechen waren schwer, doch sie waren kein Hindernis, ihm Gnade zu gewähren. Der Ketzer wurde durch eine heilige Prozedur geläutert und zu einer neuen Mission konvertiert: Dem Imperium als Servitor zu dienen. Und mit ihm viele, viele andere."
languages.original_text: "His crimes were grievous, but they were no barrier to his receiving mercy. The heretic was purified in a holy procedure and converted to a new mission to serve the Imperium as a servitor. As were many, many others."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Verbrechen waren schwer, doch sie waren kein Hindernis, ihm Gnade zu gewähren. Der Ketzer wurde durch eine heilige Prozedur geläutert und zu einer neuen Mission konvertiert: Dem Imperium als Servitor zu dienen. Und mit ihm viele, viele andere."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Bien que graves, ses crimes n'étaient pas au-delà de tout pardon. Cet hérétique a été purifié au cours d'un rituel sacré et a reçu une nouvelle mission : servir l'Imperium en qualité de servitor. Un honneur que beaucoup d'autres ont partagé. »
languages.original_text: "His crimes were grievous, but they were no barrier to his receiving mercy. The heretic was purified in a holy procedure and converted to a new mission to serve the Imperium as a servitor. As were many, many others."

traits.locale_text: « Bien que graves, ses crimes n'étaient pas au-delà de tout pardon. Cet hérétique a été purifié au cours d'un rituel sacré et a reçu une nouvelle mission : servir l'Imperium en qualité de servitor. Un honneur que beaucoup d'autres ont partagé. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Sus crímenes eran terribles, pero eso no ha impedido que reciba misericordia. El hereje ha sido purificado con un sagrado procedimiento y ha recibido una nueva misión: beneficiar al Imperium como servidor. Es el mismo destino que han recibido muchos otros».
languages.original_text: "His crimes were grievous, but they were no barrier to his receiving mercy. The heretic was purified in a holy procedure and converted to a new mission to serve the Imperium as a servitor. As were many, many others."

traits.locale_text: «Sus crímenes eran terribles, pero eso no ha impedido que reciba misericordia. El hereje ha sido purificado con un sagrado procedimiento y ha recibido una nueva misión: beneficiar al Imperium como servidor. Es el mismo destino que han recibido muchos otros».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「彼の罪は痛々しいが、慈悲を受けることを妨げるものはなかった。異端者は聖なる手順で浄化され、帝国に奉仕する新たな使命に改宗された。他の多くの者達と同じように」
languages.original_text: "His crimes were grievous, but they were no barrier to his receiving mercy. The heretic was purified in a holy procedure and converted to a new mission to serve the Imperium as a servitor. As were many, many others."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の罪は痛々しいが、慈悲を受けることを妨げるものはなかった。異端者は聖なる手順で浄化され、帝国に奉仕する新たな使命に改宗された。他の多くの者達と同じように」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Suçları ağırdı ama merhamet görmesine engel değillerdi. Kâfir, kutsal bir sürecin ardından arındırılıp İmparatorluk himayesinde hizmetörlük misyonuna atandı. Yani çok ama çok kişiyle aynı kaderi paylaştı."
languages.original_text: "His crimes were grievous, but they were no barrier to his receiving mercy. The heretic was purified in a holy procedure and converted to a new mission to serve the Imperium as a servitor. As were many, many others."
